verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H6697>rock<s%>, Who <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7128>war<s%>, And my <S%H676>fingers<s%> to <S%H4421>fight<s%>:

My <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>, My high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; My <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and he in whom I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>; Who <S%H7286>subdueth<s%> my people under <S%H5971>me<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, what is <S%H120>man<s%>, that thou takest <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H1121>him<s%>? Or the son of <S%H582>man<s%>, that thou makest account of <S%H2803>him<s%>?
Man <S%H120><s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> to <S%H1892>vanity<s%>: His <S%H3117>days<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> that passeth <S%H5674>away<s%>.
Bow <S%H5186><s%> thy <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and come <S%H3381>down<s%>: <S%H5060>Touch<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and they shall <S%H6225>smoke<s%>.
Cast <S%H1299>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%>, and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H7971>them<s%>; Send out thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and discomfit <S%H2000>them<s%>.

Stretch <S%H7971><s%> forth thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4791>above<s%>; <S%H5337>Rescue<s%> <S%H5337>me<s%>, and deliver me out of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, Out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5236>of<s%> <S%H1121>aliens<s%>;
Whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>deceit<s%>, And whose right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>.
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> unto <S%H430>thee<s%>, O God: Upon a <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> of ten <S%H6218>strings<s%> will I sing praises unto <S%H2167>thee<s%>.

Thou art he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> unto <S%H4428>kings<s%>; Who <S%H6475>rescueth<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> from the <S%H7451>hurtful<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Rescue <S%H6475><s%> <S%H5337>me<s%>, and deliver me out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5236>of<s%> <S%H1121>aliens<s%>, Whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>deceit<s%>, And whose right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>.

When our <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall be as <S%H5195>plants<s%> grown <S%H1431>up<s%> in their <S%H5271>youth<s%>, And our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> as <S%H2106>corner-stones<s%> <S%H2404>hewn<s%> after the <S%H8403>fashion<s%> of a <S%H1964>palace<s%>;

When our <S%H4200>garners<s%> are <S%H4392>full<s%>, <S%H6329>affording<s%> all manner of <S%H2177>store<s%>, And our <S%H6629>sheep<s%> bring forth <S%H503>thousands<s%> and ten <S%H503>thousands<s%> in our <S%H2351>fields<s%>;
When our <S%H441>oxen<s%> are well <S%H5445>laden<s%>; When there is no breaking <S%H6556>in<s%>, and no going <S%H3318>forth<s%>, And no <S%H6682>outcry<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets<s%>:
Happy <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H5971>people<s%> that is in such a <S%H3602>case<s%>; <S%H835>Yea<s%>, happy is the <S%H5971>people<s%> whose <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
